Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO WAYS AND MEANS

Title: Amends chapter 530 of the laws of 2024, amending the tax law relating to authorizing an occupancy tax in the village of Medina, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
Summary: Extends the authority of the village of Medina to impose an occupancy tax.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 530 of the laws of 2024 amending the tax law relating to authorizing an occupancy tax in the village of Medina, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
